nctu.fintech.appmate

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • nctu.fintech.appmate.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    資料庫連接物件，本型別適用於須存取多個 Table 時方便建立連線之用。

    Class Database represents an appmate database.

    A Database instance is not required on creating a Table instance, or creating connection. It helps when multiple table is used, which let develop can create multiple Table instance with less hard-coded parameter and make less mistake.

    It should be noted that a Database instance does not establish the actual network connection.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Database

        public Database(@NonNull
                java.lang.String host)
        建立一個 Database 實體。

        Create a Database instance which represents a connection to the remote database referred by host

        For develop whom use this constructor, it is known that frequency request without authentication would trigger CSRF protection of the database. Please consider use authenticated method instead.

        Parameters:
        host - Assigned host domain and port number. i.e. www.example.com:8000

      • Database

        public Database(@NonNull
                java.lang.String host,
                @NonNull
                java.lang.String username,
                @NonNull
                java.lang.String password)
        建立一個帶授權的 Database 實體。

        Create a Database instance with authentication information

        Parameters:
        host - Assigned host domain and port number. i.e. www.example.com:8000
        username - Assigned username to login
        password - Assigned password to login
